title: Welcome to Adaptive Technology Insights Portal
content: We are excited to launch our new intranet portal. This platform will streamline communication, leave management, and employee services.

title: Holiday Calendar Updated
content: The 2025 holiday calendar has been updated. Please check the Holiday Calendar section for details.

title: Timesheet Submission Reminder
content: Please submit your timesheets by end of this week. Late submissions may delay payroll processing.

title: New Employee Referral Program
content: Refer qualified candidates and earn rewards! Check the Job Openings section for current positions.

title: Team Building Event - December 15
content: Join us for our annual team building event on December 15th. More details to follow.
